item.title: Day Of The Devs December 2025: Everything Announced
item.content:encoded:
While most of the focus in December is centered around The Game Awards, there are other events and showcases taking place around the same time. One such event is the latest Day of the Devs from Double Fine and iam8bit that aired on December 10.

The showcase aired at 1pm ET/10am PT and featured a number of indie games ranging from psychological horror to puzzle games. In total, XX games were shown over the XX minute event. Games featured include Awaysis, Rock Beasts, XX

You can check out the full showcase below or go to the specific games you want to see in Insider Gamingâ€™s full rundown. And be sure to leave your thoughts on the showcase in the comments or join this and more discussions in the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

Everything Announced At Day of the Devs For December 2025

The games below are listed in the order that they appeared during the Day of the Devs showcase for December 2025. If you happen to find a game was missed, post it down in the comments.

item.title: PlayStation Plus Game Catalog Adding 9 Games in December 2025
item.content:encoded:
PlayStation Plus Game Catalog titles for December 2025 have been revealed, including Assassinâ€™s Creed Mirage and eight more games.

We already had an idea of the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog headliners for December, as they leaked earlier today from a reliable source. Apart from Assassinâ€™s Creed Mirage and Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty, PlayStation Plus Extra members have received seven other games, along with a new addition for Premium/Deluxe members.

PlayStation Plus Game Catalog December Games Will Be Available Next Week

As announced in the new blog post, the latest PlayStation Plus Game Catalog titles will become available on December 16, 2025. One of them, Skate Story, was made available to the players earlier this week, on December 8. Apart from the headliners, PlayStation Plus Premium members have Soulcalibur III to look forward to, originally released for the PS2 and enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick saves, and custom video filters.

Hereâ€™s the complete list of PS Plus Game Catalog December Games:

PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium/Deluxe

  • Assassinâ€™s Creed Mirage | PS5, PS4 
  • Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty | PS5, PS4
  • Skate Story | PS5
  • Granblue Fantasy: Relink | PS5, PS4
  • Planet Coaster 2 | PS5
  • Cat Quest III | PS5, PS4
  • Lego Horizon Adventures | PS5
  • Paw Patrol: Grand Prix | PS5, PS4
  • Paw Patrol World | PS5, PS4

PlayStation Plus Premium/Deluxe

  • Soulcalibur III | PS5, PS4

In other news, here are the free monthly games that PlayStation Plus added in December, which also included LEGO Horizon Adventures, Killing Floor 3, and more. Additionally, Tencent has agreed to pause the promotion of Light of Motiram as the Horizon clone lawsuit with Sony continues. What are your thoughts on PlayStation Plus Game Catalog games for December 2025? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about PokÃ©mon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimensions DLC, making it easier to claim the Shiny Charm. Donâ€™t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
